## FeaturesDataSource.add() method

Adds a custom feature in the datasource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  features | [MapViewFeature](./harp-features-datasource.mapviewfeature.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The features to add in the datasource. |
